creditline: Gift of Juliann McGuire and Michael McGuire
description: two pieces sewn together; each piece has two wide brown stripes flanking central row of multicolored stripes (predominantly red, orange and yellow) of various widths-one panel has wider rows of stripes; panel with wider colorful stripes has purple and white scroll patterned band and gold and purple scroll patterned band; other panel has red and gold scroll pattern band; warp faced plain weave with complimentary warp patterning
title: Woman's ceremonial skirt (Asku)
